name: Circuit: Laser Maze
description:
Circuit: Laser Maze is a 3D connect-the-point style laser puzzle game that combines colors and angles with an impressively retro, but unique 3rd person learning experience. Introduce yourself to the color wheel while utilizing spatial perception for some passively educational excitement. Stretch your mind to combine and separate primary and secondary colors on a journey that immerses you in tough challenges and satisfying sounds.

How to play

The objective is to connect the circuit between the laser's start point with the endpoint node of the corresponding color using the modules available.
Take full control of a 360° rotational camera to see all the angles!
Manipulate lasers in 3 dimensions to overcome obstacles and avoid other lasers to accomplish your goals.

Challenges

All starting lasers have a length of 10 meters (or 10-floor tiles) with each redirecting module adding 3 meters.
Ensure you have enough laser to reach the node.
Combine primary colors to create secondary colors or split secondary colors to create primary colors with a split/combiner module to acquire the needed color for the node.

Stuck on a puzzle?

With a non-linear progression system, simply move on to another puzzle, or for the truly determined use the built-in hint system to guide your way.
Be warned, to use the hint system you must first collect the hint crystals. Many are easy to acquire but some may be more challenging than the puzzle itself!

Xbox controller support
Windows: Fully Supported
Mac: Partially Supported
Linux: Not Supported

See key binding documentation for controller layouts.
